item.title: How to add a snake game to your contribution graph on Github
item.description: When I open somebodyâ€™s Github profile, the first thing I look for is the contribution graph. I know that the contribution graph is not informative at all, but I like to see the different patterns and images the colors form. Creating any kind of image on a contribution graph is very challenging because it requires a daily commitment to the task.
